examples.example: 昨天加班太晚，我在公司凑合了一宿。

translate.english: I worked overtime too late yesterday and made do with staying overnight at the company.

examples.example: 我们在山顶露营，开心地度过了一宿。

translate.english: We camped on the top of the mountain and spent a happy night.

examples.example: 我和朋友们在海边尽情玩耍，畅谈心事，愉快地度过了一宿。

translate.english: I played heartily with my friends by the seaside, talked freely about our worries and spent a pleasant night.
